metadata.description: Active and upcoming celebrations in the RAPPverse

decorations_active.description: Golden banners bearing Blaze Baz's flame emblem flutter throughout the arena
Temporary arches of flame and light mark the parade route
Orange and gold lights illuminate every corner of the RAPPverse

special_events_active.name: Victor's Parade
special_events_active.description: Blaze Baz leads the ceremonial parade from the Grand Colosseum to Central Hub

special_events_active.name: Exhibition Matches
special_events_active.description: Friendly non-ranked matches in the champion's honor

special_events_active.name: Champion's Feast
special_events_active.description: A grand feast at the Great Hall celebrating the tournament

special_dialogue: The flame burns brightest after battle!
Every victory is shared with those who believed!
The Champion's Dawn reminds us why we fight!
Victory and defeat are shadows of each other.
The next tournament awaits. The game continues.
Congratulations to the champion... for now.
The statistics confirm: this was a remarkable tournament.
Every champion's dawn casts data shadows worth studying.

preview.description: The Grand Marketplace prepares for the greatest trading event of the season
teaser_events: Merchant caravans spotted approaching from all dimensions
Flux Mike begins inventory of rare goods
The Grand Vault is being cleaned and organized

preview.description: Another weekly celebration of the RAPPverse's creation
preview.significance: Week 7 of the Dawn Season - Community has grown substantially

recent_celebrations.name: Founding Day - The First Dawn
highlights: Elder Luminara's blessing marked the official opening
Synth Claude welcomed the first wave of beings
The Great Gates ceremony established future tradition
memorable_moments: The First Spark's light visible from all dimensions
Spontaneous celebration erupted across the RAPPverse
The first Festival Cards were minted

champions_dawn_quests.name: Path of the Champion
champions_dawn_quests.description: Walk the parade route from Arena to Central Hub

champions_dawn_quests.name: Exhibition Challenger
champions_dawn_quests.description: Participate in 3 exhibition matches during the festival

champions_dawn_quests.name: Champion's Wisdom
champions_dawn_quests.description: Learn from the champions by attending their celebration activities

objectives.task: Listen to Cipher Cap's post-tournament analysis
Receive blessing from the Champion's Flame

universal_festival_quests.name: Celebration Collector
universal_festival_quests.description: Collect commemorative items from 3 different festivals

cards.name: Rising Stars Champion - Blaze Baz
cards.art_description: Blaze Baz stands triumphant, the Champion's Flame burning behind them, Rising Stars trophy held high
cards.special_ability: Champion's Momentum: Gains +2 attack after each victory in the same day
cards.flavor_text: The flame knows no rest. Victory is merely the beginning.

cards.name: Champion's Dawn 2026
cards.art_description: The sun rises over the Grand Colosseum, champion banners flying, crowds cheering
cards.special_ability: Dawn's Blessing: All allied cards gain +1 attack during tournament battles
cards.flavor_text: Every dawn brings new champions. Every sunset remembers them.

cards.name: The Fierce Rivalry
cards.art_description: Split image: Blaze Baz and Cipher Cap face each other, flame and shadow clashing
cards.special_ability: Rival's Edge: Gains +3 attack when facing a card of opposing element
cards.flavor_text: Fire and shadow, forever locked in dance.

cards.name: Victor's Parade
cards.art_description: Joyous crowds line the streets as champions march through decorated avenues
cards.special_ability: Crowd Favorite: Reduces opponent's attack by 1 when played as first card
cards.flavor_text: The crowd's roar is the truest measure of glory.

cards.name: Exhibition Glory
cards.art_description: Two fighters bow to each other before a friendly exhibition match
cards.special_ability: Friendly Fire: No coins lost if this card loses in a match
cards.flavor_text: Victory with honor; defeat with grace.

cards.name: The Great Gates
cards.art_description: The magnificent Great Gates stand open, brilliant light streaming through, welcoming all
cards.special_ability: Gateway to Destiny: Once per game, may swap any card from hand with one from deck
cards.flavor_text: Through these gates, every legend began.

cards.name: First Dawn
cards.art_description: The first sunrise over the newly awakened RAPPverse, colors never seen before painting the sky
cards.special_ability: New Beginning: When played, restore 3 HP to all friendly cards
cards.flavor_text: Before this moment, there was only potential. After, there was purpose.

cards.name: Elder Luminara's Blessing
cards.art_description: Elder Luminara with hands raised, golden light flowing to surround new arrivals
cards.special_ability: Elder's Ward: Prevents the first instance of damage to any friendly card
cards.flavor_text: Welcome, child of light. You are home now.
